content.question: Which of the following best explains why Queen Njinga is considered a hero?

choices.label: She ended the trade of enslaved people in the kingdom of Benin.
She engaged in a decades-long struggle against European colonization.
She reclaimed power from the Mali Empireâ€™s territorial expansion.
She refused to convert to Catholicism and retained local spiritual practices.

content.answer: She engaged in a decades-long struggle against European colonization.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
